Text:
Total waste of time. None of the albums have dates on them, and none of the albums are sorted. no track #'s. just all in alphabetical order. 

99.9% of collectors label albums by date, then title, it's common sense. And not having the tracks in order inside the folders.. just Duh....

There are lots of other Greenday discogs on here that are labelled properly. Save your time and pass on this and get one of those.

"lots of other Green Day discographies out there"??

WHERE?? 

 Thanks for the up, mcb.
